skills.skill: MS Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Excel

duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and execute master data maintenance, testing, reporting, and manufacturing support of SAP and associated boundary systems.
Design, test, and maintain manufacturing data, including items, specifications, recipes, routings, and process instructions.
Translate business requirements into a robust and compliant data design, collaborate with internal customers to ensure business requirements are achieved.
Develop and execute cGMP change controls and change requests for master data changes, and provide technical training to SAP S/4 HANA users.
Collaborate with IT and other site departments to develop and maintain site test scripts and other related testing documentation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field from an accredited college or university required, 5+ years relevant work experience required, preferably in a pharmaceutical manufacturing environment.
